text: No other news except that Elaine is engaged and going to marry a foreigner ... Gay man she had spent so much time with at her party. That was why Gavin had come back to her. Everything was quite clear now, and to her own surprise Gay felt no heartbreak, rather a sense of relief now that she knew why Gavin had come to see her.
